required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Retrospective Chart Review to Evaluate Diagnosis and Treatment of Chronic Migraine and Headache

brief_summary.textblock: This study is a retrospective chart review in patients diagnosed with headache or migraine to evaluate treatment patterns and diagnosis.

primary_outcome.measure: Presence or Absence of Prophylactic Medication for Headache/Migraine
primary_outcome.description: The presence or absence of prophylactic medications used by the subject for headache/migraine is evaluated through the study period.

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of Unique Prophylactic Medications for Headache/Migraine Reported
secondary_outcome.description: The numbers of unique prophylactic medications used by the subjects for headache/migraine are evaluated through the study period.

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of Days With a Headache Recorded at the Visit With the Highest Number of Headaches
secondary_outcome.description: The number of headache days is reported at the visit with the highest number of headaches.

secondary_outcome.measure: Highest Number of Headache Days Per Month at a Qualifying Visit
secondary_outcome.description: The highest number of headache days per month are reported at a qualifying visit per the medical record.

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of Visits for Headache Diagnosis
secondary_outcome.description: The number of visits for headache diagnosis is evaluated through the study period.

arm_group.description: This is a retrospective chart review for patients diagnosed with Chronic Migraine. There is no intervention in this study.
This is a retrospective chart review of patients with headache diagnoses other than Chronic Migraine. There is no intervention in this study.

intervention.description: There is no intervention in this study.

study_pop.textblock: Patients with a diagnosis of chronic migraine or other diagnosis of migraine or headache.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Diagnosis of chronic migraine or other diagnosis of migraine or headache for a minimum of 15 months
- Eight (8) headache days per month for at least 1 of the preceding 15 months
Exclusion Criteria:
- Not currently diagnosed with chronic migraine, headache or migraine
- History of receiving botulinum toxin injections for the treatment of chronic migraine.

certain_agreements.pi_employee: Principal Investigators are NOT employed by the organization sponsoring the study.
certain_agreements.restrictive_agreement: A disclosure restriction on the PI is that the sponsor can review results communications prior to public release and can embargo communications regarding trial results for a period that is less than or equal to 90 days from the time submitted to the sponsor for review. The sponsor cannot require changes to the communication and cannot extend the embargo.
